LanguageData.ARA_BindDrone.label: pheromone label
LanguageData.ARA_BindDrone.description: When you use pheromones to mark a wild Arachne Insect or Beast Insect, it leaves its wild state, swears allegiance to the Empress, and establishes a spiritual bond.\n\nThe Empress automatically establishes a link with allied Insects and Beast Insects. No skills are required.
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceOn.label: Removal of reproductive suppression
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceOn.description: This will re-enable the ability of Arachne Insects to automatically raise Insects.
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceOff.label: Breeding suppression
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceOff.description: This will automatically disable the Arachne Insect's ability to cultivate the Arachne Insect.
LanguageData.ARA_Suicide_Ability.label: suicide
LanguageData.ARA_Suicide_Ability.description: With a single command, the arachne bugs instantly end their lives for the sake of their nest.
LanguageData.ARA_Suicide_Fast_Ability.label: suicide
LanguageData.ARA_Suicide_Fast_Ability.description: With a single command, the arachne bugs instantly end their lives for the sake of their nest.
LanguageData.ARA_TumorSpew.label: Mycocele release
LanguageData.ARA_TumorSpew.description: It expels the mycelium and transforms a wide area around it into a mycelium.This facilitates the activity of the insect swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_TumorSpew.comps.CompAbilityEffect_Ne: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst_Queen.label: Acid liquid injection
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst_Queen.description: It sprays a large amount of corrosive acid toward the target location, completely covering the area, annihilating enemy forces and reducing the armor of survivors.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst_Queen.comps.CompAbili: Acid solution cannot be sprayed because the acid sac is damaged or missing.
Research plan/node VXI-6 "acid sac" is required to unlock the skill.
LanguageData.ARA_Toxic_Needle_Fire.label: rapid fire of poisonous needles
LanguageData.ARA_Toxic_Needle_Fire.description: Arachne insects use their venomous sting glands to fire a series of powerful poisonous tail stingers at their enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Toxic_Needle_Fire.comps.CompAbilityE: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
The venomous stinger cannot be fired because the stinger gland is damaged or missing.
Research plan/node PAV-5 "Poison Needle" is required to unlock the skill.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst.label: Acid liquid injection
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst.description: The Arachne Insect sprays a corrosive acid liquid at the target location.Although it is not as strong as the Empress type's acid rain, the power of the insect acid is still brutal.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst.comps.CompAbilityEffe: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
Acid solution cannot be sprayed because the acid sac is damaged or missing.
Research plan/node VXI-6 "acid sac" is required to unlock the skill.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_jump.label: high altitude maneuver
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_jump.description: It drives its strong wings all at once and instantly moves to a new position.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_jump.verbProperties.label: jump
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_jump.comps.CompAbilityEffe: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Possess.label: Protozoan species parasitic attack
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Possess.description: It leaps onto its target, pierces its nerve center with its tail stinger, and replaces it with its own control signals. If the parasitism is successful, the target's body is completely taken over and it acts as a member of the Arachne swarm; if it cannot penetrate the armor, the parasitism fails, but it is unable to penetrate the captive or inactive body. It is always successful against the powerful.\n\nThe parasite needs to receive the pheromone tag of the Empress species, and continues to live like a shell without emotions or higher-order desires.The target's skills and background are replaced with those of the protozoan species, and when the host dies, the protozoan species escapes from the body.
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Smokepop.label: Pheromone fog release
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Smokepop.description: The stray mist species releases a large amount of Arachne pheromone smoke from its abdomen. This smoke hides the appearance of the insect swarm and blocks the flames. The more people (both friend and foe) stained with the pheromones, the more reinforcement insect people will appear from underground.
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Smokepop.comps.CompAbilityEf: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Baneling_Suicide_Ability.label: benign self-destruction
LanguageData.ARA_Baneling_Suicide_Ability.description: The Arachne explosive species self-destructs without activating the highly corrosive acid. This self-destruction causes only minor damage, does not produce acid mist, and leaves a wide-spread creep.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper_Ability_On.label: Creep laying: start
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper_Ability_On.descript: Activates the creep-laying ability of this Arachne Kingworm species. It changes the surrounding terrain into Arachne Creep at regular intervals. Enemies that approach this Kingworm species will also receive automatic attacks from the Mycocele tube. The Mycocele tube changes the terrain and fires a Mycocele bullet that lays creep.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper_Ability_Off.label: Creep laying: stop
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper_Ability_Off.descrip: Stops the ability of this species to lay down creep, and prevents it from changing the surrounding terrain.
LanguageData.ARA_Tumorthrow.label: Mycocele projection
LanguageData.ARA_Tumorthrow.description: It projects fungal growths to the target point and changes the surrounding terrain into creep, facilitating the activity of insect swarms.
LanguageData.ARA_Tumorthrow.comps.CompAbilityEffect_N: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_TrackingCharge.label: assault assault
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_TrackingCharge.description: Charges toward the target, damaging everything in its path. The longer the charge distance, the more damage it deals.
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_TrackingCharge.comps.CompAbi: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_PsychicBrainburn.label: psychic cauterization
LanguageData.ARA_PsychicBrainburn.description: Pure psychic energy burns out the target's nerve centers, instantly ending their life.
LanguageData.ARA_NeuroSwarm_jump.label: high altitude maneuver
LanguageData.ARA_NeuroSwarm_jump.description: It strengthens your body's ability to float, allowing you to rise quickly and fly to new locations.
LanguageData.ARA_NeuroSwarm_jump.verbProperties.label: jump
LanguageData.ARA_GuardianPsyField_On.label: Weaving area type Cyfield
LanguageData.ARA_GuardianPsyField_On.description: Origen types develop a powerful psychic defense field that automatically intercepts hostile projectiles that enter within its range.The total amount of the shield depends on psychosensitivity, and although it is difficult to penetrate, Scienttropy accumulates each time it is intercepted.
LanguageData.ARA_GuardianPsyField_Off.label: Weaving area type Cyfield
LanguageData.ARA_GuardianPsyField_Off.description: Stops the psychic defense field of the Ori region species.
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Morph.label: Weaving area form
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Morph.description: It generates oriza and transforms itself into a static structure. In this form, the Arachne weaving species can explore the more advanced techniques of insect swarms.
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Morph.comps.CompAbilityEffec: Ability must be on the terrain
Ability is disabled because it is not on terrain
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode_Needle_Fire.label: Pseudoline parasitic needle
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode_Needle_Fire.descriptio: It injects a needle that causes the target to be parasitized by the Arachne Pseudolines.As the infection progresses, the target becomes dominated by the Pseudolines and transforms into a strong body that ignores external stimuli.\n\nHowever, since the Pseudolines are not controlled by the Empress species, there is great danger in its use.
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode_Needle_Fire.comps.Comp: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
Research plan/node MED-2 "Pseudoline type" is required to unlock the skill.
LanguageData.ARA_FireSpew.label: deflagration flame
LanguageData.ARA_FireSpew.description: Deflagration seeds emit flame over a wide area in front after a short reservoir. Although the range of this flame emission is not very long, it can form a dense wall of flame.
LanguageData.ARA_FireSpew.comps.CompAbilityEffect_Nee: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Dissolver_Touch.label: strong acid
LanguageData.ARA_Dissolver_Touch.description: Sprays the target with soluble strong acid at close range. The target's organs are rapidly decomposed and converted into a large amount of honey cans. Due to extremely low accuracy, it cannot be used in combat, and can only be used on targets that do not resist.
LanguageData.ARA_Dissolver_Touch.comps.CompAbilityEff: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility_jump.label: pursuit type jump
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility_jump.descriptio: It uses its strong tendons to jump to the target location.The pursuing species remains hidden during the jump.
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility_jump.comps.Comp: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility_Execution.label: scythe execution
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility_Execution.descr: The pursuit species wields a scythe and deals a powerful blow to the enemy, executing them. After the attack, they reveal themselves.
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_ExtractGene.label: Gene stealing
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_ExtractGene.description: The variant extracts 1 to 4 genes (including the Alkite gene) from the target's gene pool and incorporates them into its own genetic sequence.The extracted subject will not die, but will lose this gene and be unable to wake up from the coma.
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_ExtractGene.comps.CompAb: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_InjectGenes.label: gene injection
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_InjectGenes.description: The rogue variant attempts to inject all of its genes into the target's body. If the target has at least one gene identical to the rogue variant, this injection cannot be performed.
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_InjectGenes.comps.CompAb: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_EjectOrgans.label: flesh and blood extraversion
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_EjectOrgans.description: The Arachne Variant causes a severe mutation in the target, flipping all of its organs to the surface of its body, allowing it to be harvested by the Insectsâ€”a process that almost guarantees death for the target.This ability can only be used on colonists, prisoners, and slaves who do not belong to the Insects.
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_EjectOrgans.comps.CompAb: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainHeal_Ability.label: creep treatment
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainHeal_Ability.description: Extracts biological material from the creep's nutrient tube and synthesizes healing elements to heal allies. Can only be used on individuals of the Arachne insect group that have the ability to self-regenerate.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainHeal_Ability.comps.CompAbilit: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
Abilities must be placed on terrain
Can only be used against Arachne Bug swarm units with self-healing ability.
The target must be a group of Arachnid bugs that have the ability to self-heal.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrorRoar_Ability.label: Intimidating roar
LanguageData.ARA_TerrorRoar_Ability.description: Arachne Insect roars at surrounding enemies, scaring them away and causing them to flee. Can only be used on mycelial terrain.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrorRoar_Ability.comps.CompAbility: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
Abilities must be placed on terrain
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTempt_Ability.label: distorted temptation
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTempt_Ability.description: The Arachne Insect warps the target's mind and makes the insect group believe they are ``lovable beings.'' As a result, the target launches a frenzied attack on foreign enemies that harm the insect group. Can only be used on mycelial terrain.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTempt_Ability.comps.CompAbili: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
Abilities must be placed on terrain
LanguageData.ARA_Strengthening_Tendon_Jump.label: short distance jump
LanguageData.ARA_Strengthening_Tendon_Jump.descriptio: The strengthened tendons allow the Arachne bugs to jump short distances.
LanguageData.ARA_Strengthening_Tendon_Jump.comps.Comp: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_jump.label: Konoe type jump
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_jump.description: Jump to your goal using your strong tendons.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_jump.comps.CompAbilityEff: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Commander_Ability_On.desc: This Arachne Guard type command node will be activated to form a secondary hive mind network that will enhance the fighting ability of the surrounding Insects. During this time, the fighting ability of the Guard type itself will be partially reduced.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Commander_Ability_Off.des: Stops the command ability of the Arachne Guards and allows them to focus on their own battles.
LanguageData.ARA_Locust_AcidSprayBurst.label: Acid liquid spraying
LanguageData.ARA_Locust_AcidSprayBurst.description: The Arachne locust species sprays a corrosive acid solution at a target location.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_TailSweep.label: tail sweep
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_TailSweep.description: Swings its tail and slams enemies in front of it. It deals damage to all enemies within a fan-shaped area, and even if they survive, they will be blown away and stunned for a certain period of time.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_TailSweep.comps.CompAbili: Needs to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Long_Jump.label: Forbidden species jump
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Long_Jump.description: Use your strong tendons to jump to your goal.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Long_Jump.comps.CompAbili: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Pouch_Hatching_Baneling.label: Cocoon hatching: explosive species
LanguageData.ARA_Pouch_Hatching_Baneling.description: Hatches 3 Arachne Explosive Seed Insects at your feet and causes the enemy to perform a suicide attack.
LanguageData.ARA_Pouch_Hatching_Baneling.comps.CompAb: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
LanguageData.ARA_Pouch_Hatching_Pouch.label: Cocoon hatching: mycocele
LanguageData.ARA_Pouch_Hatching_Pouch.description: It expels fungal growths and transforms the surrounding area into creep terrain, aiding the activities of insect swarms and hindering the enemy's progress.
LanguageData.ARA_Pouch_Hatching_Pouch.comps.CompAbili: Need to eat due to nutritional deficiencies
